1.title: The Game, Field, Players and Equipment
1.description: Basic rules about the game, field dimensions, player requirements, and equipment standards.

2.title: Definitions
2.description: Official definitions of terms used throughout the NCAA football rulebook.

3.title: Periods, Time Factors and Substitutions
3.description: Rules governing game periods, timing, and player substitutions.

4.title: Ball in Play, Dead Ball, Out of Bounds
4.description: Rules about when the ball is live, dead, and out of bounds.

5.title: Series of Downs, Team Possession After Penalty
5.description: Rules about downs, series, and possession after penalties.

6.title: Kicks
6.description: Rules governing all types of kicks including punts, field goals, and kickoffs.

7.title: Snap, Hand-to-Hand Pass, Handoff
7.description: Rules about the snap, hand-to-hand passes, and handoffs.

8.title: Forward Pass, Backward Pass, Fumble
8.description: Rules governing forward passes, backward passes, and fumbles.

9.title: Scoring
9.description: Rules about how points are scored in college football.

10.title: Enforcement of Penalties
10.description: Rules about how penalties are enforced and applied.
